评论详情: OK, there isn’t a thread of natural fiber in this shirt, but I purchased it to attend a 1970s disco themed wedding.  It was a hit. Several people came up to me and said “you understood the assignment” or “you win, best outfit here”.  It’s a one and done purchase. Even though it is surprisingly well made, I’ll never wear it again, but it served its purpose and impressed people with its authenticity.
I got this shirt to go with gold disco pants for a costume party. It was VERY dark and did not look good at all.  The fit and quality seemed OK, but the color made it un-usable.

I know my sense of style might be a bit unique, but I think I just found my new favorite shirt. It fits exactly as expected, seems to be of good quality, and I think I look good in it. It works with jeans for afternoon cocktails, or even with a suit and tie for a night out.

评论用户: Awesome shirt for my man! He looks dazzling!
评论详情: Awesome shirt! True to size.My man looks awesome in this!

评论概述: Just as described and recieved very quickly
评论详情: Item arrived very quickly, and was better t h an described Fit great- as suggested, I ordered 1 size smaller than the chart says, and it fit just right.
Shirt SHINES as advertised.  Good quality and comes with a spare button too.  :-)
Ordered a 2xl shirt……was really about a 1x.  Couldnt even get it over my shoulders.  Order 2 sizes bigger than you think.
Bought the XXL and it fit true.  I purchased shirts from other companies and the XXL were more like a men’s medium or large.  This one fits!
Had a birthday party for my brother-in-law, and we all dressed in Elton John like garb. I was the hit of the party. Everybody loved it!

Impressed by how good it looks for the price, colors react well to light. Comfortable and breathable. Will be great for electronic concerts. Took one star off because the sizing is a little big (order one size smaller than you normally do) and it’s obviously an issue many people have since the XL I got was repackaged and not folded or in it’s original bag. Many reviews have reiterated this.
Liked how it looked
Got so many complements while wearing the shirt, it was a perfect choice.
Very well done. Good fabric. Would buy again

评论概述: FOR WHEN YOU WANT TO STAND OUT IN A CROWD!!!
评论详情: This is a shirt for a special occasion where you want to stand out.  Whether it's clubbing, disco night, Vegas, or a party, this is the kind of shirt that will get you noticed.  I'm a bigger body frame, and the size I ordered was what I was expecting for roominess.  It is lined with a black material inside to keep the shiny material from clinging to your body, which I appreciated.  It does change color depending on the lighting which makes it a fun shirt to wear.  There's no way you won't get comments on this shirt when you wear it! ;)
I love this shirt, it’s so cool and comfortable and it really is true to size! Definitely recommend it

This shirt is worth so much more than I paid!  Bought this for my husband for a disco party. But the great fabric, the stretch and the neon shine is so pretty he wants to wear it for a regular night out!  I agree. It’s that pretty. We also bought the beautiful blue one too. Gorgeous!!

Got this for my son and loved it so much, I stole it! I know it says disco era but I’m telling you when I was you in the late 80’s I had a dress that looked just like this! This is great for themed parties or New Year’s Eve or for your mama to steal and wear as a flashy open shirt over a tank top and ripped jeans to relive her youth! It’s an oversized shirt on me and is cute worn open with a knot tied in the bottom on both sides. On my sons athletic build it’s a loose shirt with a good deal of stretch. He has muscular arms and with the stretch has full range of motion in the arms. The material is soft and it’s quite comfortable. The sleeves have one button around the wrist so for me I just cuffed them. It comes with an extra button.
It is a shiny shirt but at the same time it looks elegant and is very soft and light. Perfect for an event, concert, new year or an elegant celebration. The size was perfect. I highly recommend it

评论概述: Cool shirt, looks just like product pictures
评论详情: I got this for my 19 year old son. It looks so cool. The fabric is soft and stretchy. The inside of the shirt is black. He usually likes his shirts a little tighter (this is a small, he’s 6’ 175-185lb). I washed it with a normal load, but pulled it out of the dryer early, just in case. It came out fine. It would look great with a pair of black pants or dark jeans.
This shirt is so nice! My husband wore it for Christmas and got so many compliments! It fit perfectly. The material is stretchy. Despite how it looks, it's not scratchy at all!
Wore it to a dance last night and got a number of compliments. Fits the disco era well, but not too bad for present-day parties, either.
Perfect fit, looks great on the dance floor, can wear it out or tucked in.

评论概述: A little snug, but great shirt
评论详情: I have a Homer Simpson body, and while this was fine around the belly, it was a bit tight in the shoulders. Otherwise, fun little shirt that will grab attention! Does not feel cheap at all.
Very soft and fits well.

Hubby is in a band. They perform music of the 70's, Disco, Motown & more. They dress the part. This shiny metallic shirt is just what he needed to complete his look. Luv, luv, luv it!!! If you're a performer, entertainer or just want to stand out in a crowd, we recommend this shirt. It's hot, hot, hot!!!
